snippet: The Huffington Post Streaming Network, expected to be introduced this summer, is described by its founders as a "never-ending talk show."
abstract: The Huffington Post Streaming Network, expected to be introduced this summer, is described by its founders as a "never-ending talk show."
lead_paragraph: AOL and The Huffington Post are readying a live video network that will have 12 hours of programming every weekday when it starts this summer.

headline.main: Watch Out, TV: AOL and HuffPo Jump Into Live Video
